text: On April 7, 2021, six people, including two children, were shot at a house in Rock Hill, South Carolina, United States. Phillip Adams, a former National Football League player, was named as the suspect. Five of the shooting victims died, while a sixth is hospitalized in critical condition with serious gunshot wounds. On April 8, 2021, the York County Sheriff's Office said in a press conference that the suspect was Adams. Adams later killed himself before he could be arrested. ==Notes== ==References== Category:2021 mass shootings in the United States Category:2021 murders in the United States Category:2020s in South Carolina Category:April 2021 events Category:Mass murder in 2021 Category:Mass murder in the United States Category:Murder-suicides in the United States Category:Suicide in the 2020s
title: 2021 Rock Hill shooting
